item.title: OneRepublic - Rescue Me
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Bm. In the original key.
Chords Used: Bm, A, D, G
As performed by OneRepublic. This was a request from my own two boys, age 7 & 10. If you read this comments, they would be thrilled if you watched some of their videos and followed them.
Older son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnXyBzSlqfs_N0Sz8EeTj7Q Younger son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLCD1tFgLd6rgT1WzdR4paA
And if you are reading all of this, please follow my other ukulele channel: https://www.youtube.com/ukestuff As these videos cannot be monetized, subscriptions and views on the other channel really will help me out.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/JZA5jnT4brY
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion video is from churchmediadrop.com
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: OneRepublic - Counting Stars
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Am (Am, C, G, F, & Dm). Lowered a major third from the original in C# minor.
As performed by OneRepublic
I have a play along of this song in D minor (published August 2, 2017). A teacher asked for a version in Am, and at the time I wasn’t archiving old videos, so I had to recreate this video. I have tried to make fewer slide transitions, but this results in smaller text...hope that’s okay.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: OneRepublic - If I Lose Myself
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play If I Lose Myself on the ukulele by Alesso and One Republic. The chords used are C F G Am.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: OneRepublic - I Lived
item.description:
-Features 6 different options for strumming with demo of each (slow tempo and then up to speed for song) -Also includes an optional picking style (demo included) -Chords used: A, D, F#m
Begins with strumming information 2:03 Start of picking information 2:45 Song starts
I do not own the copyright to this music.
